occurrence_frequency.en: less than every other academic year

description.en: The course provides an advanced-level overview to the current research themes in the fields of pharmaceutical and related sciences. The course will also train the student to follow oral scientific presentations in the scientific podium. During the course, the student participates at least in seven (7) seminars, acts as a discussion moderator in one seminar, and participate in one excursion to pharmaceutical industry, companies or institutions (+ written report).
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate aktuaalsetest uurimisteemadest farmaatsias ja farmaatsiaga külgnevates teadustes. Kursusel õpitakse jälgima teaduslikke ettekandeid. Kursuse raamides võtab üliõpilane osa vähemalt 7-st seminarist, osaleb ühel seminaril aktiivselt diskussioonil ning osaleb ekskursioonil (+ kirjalik raport).

objectives.en: The course aims to introduce and provide overview to the current research trends in pharmaceutical sciences by presenting a wide range of research themes in the different fields of pharmaceutical and related sciences.
objectives.et: Kursus annab sissejuhatuse ja ülevaate farmaatsiateaduste aktuaalsetest trendidest ning erinevatest uurimissuundadest ja farmaatsiaga piirnevates teadustes.

objectives.en: The student will also learn to get to know oral presentations and discussion in the scientific podium as well as to write an excursion report.
objectives.et: Üliõpilane õpib jälgima suulist ettekannet teadusseminaril, osalema diskussioonil ja kirjutama raportit ekskursioonist.

learning_outcomes.en: The MSc/PhD student who has passed the 	course:
-	have an overview on the up-to-date research topics and areas in pharmaceutical sciences carried out in Estonia
learning_outcomes.et: - on saanud ülevaate Eestis läbiviidavatest farmatseutiliste uuringute teemadest

learning_outcomes.en: -	knows the general practices and methods to prepare an oral scientific presentation
learning_outcomes.et: - üliõpilane oskab jälgida suulist teaduslikku ettekannet;

learning_outcomes.en: -	understands the added value of scientific discussion and participating in scientific meetings
